mapper.insert: insert into clan_war (clan_tag, tag, season, state, team_size, preparation_start_time, start_time, end_time, is_league_war) values (#{warInfo.clanTag}, #{warInfo.tag}, #{warInfo.season}, #{warInfo.state}, #{warInfo.teamSize}, #{warInfo.preparationStartTime}, #{warInfo.startTime}, #{warInfo.endTime}, #{warInfo.isLeagueWar}) on duplicate key update `state` = values(state), `update_time` = now()
